Version Register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x0
Size:
0x4

Description

The version information of this IP

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:24] MAJOR r - -
[23:16] MINOR r - -
[15:0] MICRO r - -

Field Descriptions

MAJOR

The major version of this IP. A change in major version indicates that the software needs changes. This document describes the behaviours of MAJOR version 1.

MINOR

The minor version of this IP. A change in minor version indicates that the hardware has undergone some changes yet its software interface has not changed.

MICRO

The micro version of this IP. Every commit increases this version.
